title: Phantom Fury
description: Shelly “Bombshell” Harrison is back in this highly interactive mix of first person action and road movie adventure . Embark on an adrenaline-fueled journey around the USA . Use an enormous arsenal of weapons and skills to battle treacherous soldiers and vile mutants, all while trying to save mankind. Taking place many years after her fight against Jadus Heskel, Shelly “Bombshell” Harrison awakes in a new world, pulled out of a coma at the behest of an old colleague, with a new bionic arm. Tasked with securing a highly dangerous artifact, the legendary Demon Core, Shelly embarks on an intense journey around the US, as she tries to overcome her own past to save mankind’s future. Bellwright

system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB or AMD RX 5500 XT
